title: Carrier's New Abound Net Zero Management Solution Helps Building Portfolio Customers Reach Energy and ... - PR Newswire
summary: Carrier launches Abound™ Net Zero Management, a digital solution to track and report energy and carbon performance for building portfolios in line with ESG goals, helping reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
green_innovation: TRUE. This innovation aligns with environmental sustainability goals by providing a solution to measure and reduce energy and carbon impacts in buildings, contributing to decarbonization efforts and promoting environmental stewardship.
business_innovation: TRUE. This introduction of a new digital solution by Carrier for tracking and managing energy and carbon performance in buildings constitutes a significant improvement in their business processes, aligning with the firm's sustainability goals.
green_product: FALSE. The article focuses on a digital solution (Abound™ Net Zero Management) for tracking energy and carbon performance in buildings, which is a service rather than a physical good, and hence does not fit the definition of a green product.
green_process: TRUE. The Abound™ Net Zero Management solution described in the article incorporates digital technologies that aim to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability in building energy and carbon management processes, thus meeting the criteria of a green process.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 238220 - Plumbing, Heating, and Air-Conditioning Contractors, 541512 - Computer Systems Design Services, 551112 - Offices of Other Holding Companies, 236220 - Commercial and Institutional Building Construction
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not exhibit signs of greenwashing as it conveys genuine efforts by Carrier to introduce a digital solution for sustainable energy and carbon management in buildings in alignment with ESG goals.

title: Sinopec Launches the World's Largest Green Hydrogen-Coal Chemical Project in Inner Mongolia - PR Newswire
summary: China Petroleum & Chemical Corporation (Sinopec) launched a hydrogen demonstration project in Inner Mongolia to produce green hydrogen using solar and wind energy resources, aiming to reduce carbon emissions and contribute to China's green energy goals.
green_innovation: TRUE - The project involves producing green hydrogen using renewable energy sources, contributing to environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE - Sinopec's project introducing green hydrogen production constitutes a business innovation in the energy sector.
green_product: FALSE - The article focuses on a green process for producing hydrogen, not a specific product.
green_process: TRUE - The process of producing green hydrogen from solar and wind energy in the Project aligns with green innovation principles.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 211111 - Crude Petroleum and Natural Gas Extraction, 325110 - Petrochemical Manufacturing, 221114 - Solar Electric Power Generation, 221115 - Wind Electric Power Generation
greenwashing: FALSE - The article does not exhibit greenwashing, as the project involves genuine efforts to produce green hydrogen using renewable energy sources.
